data.name: Slime Kingdom - An Unlikely Adventure! Episode 1: And so it begins...
data.detailed_description:
SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMNT!!!


I'll be hosting a CONTEST for Fan art from now until June 1st! You can find out more here:
https://one-manindie.com/current-events/2021/5/19/do-you-like-slime-kingdom-drawing-contests-this-is-for-you


About the Game




This is the First OFFICIAL Episode of the SKAUA Saga

A lowly slime barely survives an encounter with a hero and limps(?) his way home. He's mad about his lot in life as just a exp grab for some dimwitted hero. He's tired of the oppression of those wandering brutes and their swords and spells. He decides to fight back and create a safe place for slimes of all kinds to ooze about their lives.

This is his story...

FEATURES


Synergy-centered game mechanics based on closeness party members.


Helpful abilities called “GIFTS” that activate depending on who leads the party!


Customize your party by giving them "Talents" learned from their enemies!

data.short_description: Barely surviving a brush with a random adventurer, a lone Snot slime throws caution to the wind and leaves home to forge a new destiny for himself and his kind. He's small and unassuming, but filled with determination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
